question: Show screenwriters and playwrights who have studied at New York University.
sql_query1:
SELECT Writer.name 
FROM Writer
WHERE (Writer.Type = "Screenwriter" OR Writer.Type = "Playwright") AND Writer.Education = "New York University"
sql_query2:
SELECT Writer.name 
FROM Writer
WHERE Writer.Type = "Screenwriter" OR Writer.Type = "Playwright" AND Writer.Education = "New York University"
interpretation1: Which screenwriters have studied at New York University which playwrights have studied at the same university?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all screenwriters and also provide a list of playwrights who have studied at New York University.
